name: Harry's Hat
description:
## Harry's Hat

From the sun-drenched wheat fields to the auction's spotlight, this hat's a symbol of Harry's dedication to his craft.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
